text:
Originally reported by: **BitBucket: [ceridwenv](http://bitbucket.org/ceridwenv), GitHub: @ceridwen**

---

There are multiple methods in LocalsDictNodeNG that are roughly duplicates of methods in collections.Mapping, and using it would require implementing only one more trivial method, `__len__`.

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/231
title: Use collections.Mapping to provide methods for LocalsDictNodeNG
Use collections.Mapping to provide methods for LocalsDictNodeNG

text: I'm closing this, I don't see a benefit and the code will still look the same.
